recipesJson.name: Lava Cream
recipesJson.author: RdaJunkie
recipesJson.description: Liquid barn is slowly becoming my favorite flavor house. This recipe shows exactly why. Super simple and good off the shake. Rich, creamy, chocolate lava cake

reviews.text: Dammit this is a tasty chocolate mix.  I subbed TPA VBIC and Bavarian Cream, so IDK how much different mine is from the original, but that lava cake is FIRE
